content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable]
(
	 [EmployeeNumber] VARCHAR,
	 [Department] VARCHAR,
	 [Education] VARCHAR,
	 [Gender] VARCHAR,
	 [Age] INT,
	 [JobLevel] INT,
	 [JobRole] VARCHAR,
	 [MaritalStatus] VARCHAR,
	 [NumCompaniesWorked] INT,
	 [PerformanceRating] INT,
	 [TrainingTimeLastYear] INT,
	 [YearsAtCompany] INT,
	 [YearsInCurrentRole] INT,
	 [YearSinceLastPromotion] INT,
	 [YearsWithCurr4] INT,
	 [JobSatisfaction] INT,
	 [EnvironmentSatisfaction] INT,
	 [WorkLifeBalance] INT,
	 [EmployeeCount] INT
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/folder/file',
	DATA_SOURCE = [DataSource1],
	FILE_FORMAT = [FileFormat1]
)


ALTER TABLE EmployeeSurvey Alter column EmployeeNumber VARCHAR
